Question: How can I change the default message from QnA Maker?
Answer: You can change the default message if you use the QnAMakerDialog. See this for details: https://docs.botframework.com/en-us/azure-bot-service/templates/qnamaker/#navtitle

Question: How do I programmatically create a KB?
Answer: You can use our REST apis to create a KB. See here for details: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/cognitiveservices/qnamaker/knowledgebase/create

Question: How do I programmatically update my KB?
Answer: You can use our REST apis to update your KB. See here for details: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/cognitiveservices/qnamaker/knowledgebase/update

Question: How do I programmatically refresh endpoint keys?
Answer: You can use our REST apis to refresh endpoint keys. See here for details: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/cognitiveservices/qnamaker/endpointkeys/refreshkeys
